attributes.action: Make movies in america come out in uk at the same time
attributes.additional_details: we feel that it is very disloyal to England as we believe in equality in this country, we have been waiting for months for this movie only to find out that we have to wait a month longer
attributes.background: Incredibles is a movie that many fellow British citizens and some immigrants have been waiting for, it has come to my attention that many were very displeased with the fact America had come out with it first

rejection.details: Film releases are not the responsibility the UK Government or Parliament.
